bibl.title: Scribal Behaviour and Theological Tendencies in Singular Readings in P. Bodmer II (P66).
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Introduction to P. Bodmer II (P66) (= van Haelst 426; LDAB 2777). - 3. The Study of Singular Readings and Scribal Habits in P. Bodmer II (P66). - 4. Theological Tendencies in Singular Readings of P. Bodmer II (P66). - 5. Conclusions.

bibl.title: Textual Variation: Theological and Social Tendencies? Papers from the Fifth Birmingham Colloquium on the Textual Criticism of the New Testament

bibl.seg: Peter M. Head, Scribal Behaviour and Theological Tendencies in Singular Readings in P. Bodmer II (P66).

H.A.G. Houghton & D.C. Parker (edd.), Textual Variation: Theological and Social Tendencies? Papers from the Fifth Birmingham Colloquium on the Textual Criticism of the New Testament = Text and Studies. Third Series. 6 (Piscataway, NJ, 2008) pp. 55-74, nombr. figg.

1. Introduction. - 2. Introduction to P. Bodmer II (P66) (= van Haelst 426; LDAB 2777). - 3. The Study of Singular Readings and Scribal Habits in P. Bodmer II (P66). - 4. Theological Tendencies in Singular Readings of P. Bodmer II (P66). - 5. Conclusions.
